required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The DAWN Camostat Trial for Ambulatory COVID-19 Patients
clinical_study.official_title: The DAWN Camostat Trial: the Efficacy of Camostat for COVID-19 Infections Presenting to Ambulatory Care: a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, placebo controlled, individually randomized controlled phase III trial in Primary Care, assessing the efficacy of Camostat in preventing hospital admission or death in Covid-19 patients.

detailed_description.textblock: In patients aged 50 years and above and diagnosed with Covid-19 upon study entry, we will evaluate the efficacy of camostat on hospital admission or death within 30 days after randomisation. Participants will be randomly assigned to camostat or placebo using a computer generated randomisation process. Participants will be treated for 7 days, and follow-up will be 30 days.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Hospital admission for at least 24 hours or death

secondary_outcome.measure: Hospital admission for at least 24 hours

secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 30 days after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Time from randomization to self-reported recovery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 days and 30 days after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Score on the WHO clinical progression scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxygen administration in the home setting
secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 30 days after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients who had oxygen at least once

secondary_outcome.measure: All-cause mortality at 1 year after randomization

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 7 days and 30 days after randomization

secondary_outcome.measure: Symptom duration for each individual symptom
secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 30 days after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of symptoms reported by the patient in the patient diary as being present since randomisation

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of hospital admission for those admitted to hospital
secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 30 days after randomization
over a period of 30 days after randomization
secondary_outcome.description: Number of contacts with general practitioners, out-of-hours services, emergency department visits, specialist assessments

secondary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 30 days after randomisation
secondary_outcome.description: Antibiotic consumption expressed in defined daily dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 7 days and 30 days after randomization

arm_group.description: 4 x 200 milligram per day for 7 days

intervention.description: oral tablets, identical in size and shape
